pages.text: $(o)This material defies gravity itself when existent as an entity, a property which, under the proper stimuli, it can give to other entities as well.

$(o)First, shift-clicking one onto a boat attaches it, making the boat completely weightless until it is next broken. In this state, you can row it though the skies. $(p)Already, this is quite useful -- but we can do better.
$(o)Brewing a scale with a $(item)Thick Potion$(0) creates a potion that confers weightlessness to the consumer for a limited time. $(p)

$(o)Finally, if combined with a sufficiently powerful source of endless Light, the scales can create a 'field' in which $(thing)Living Things$(o) do not experience gravity. $(item)Items$(o) that enter the radius are rendered weightless until next collected.

$(o)Clicking a $(item)Gravity Chandelier$(0) will offset its area of effect.$(br2)$(o)You might find it hard to navigate without gravity -- if so, I'd suggest checking the $(l:reactive:results/power_uses)Applied Power$(/l) entry for something that could help.
$(o)If you find yourself not wanting to make another scale in the same method, they can be duplicated fairly easily.
